items: Start by kneeling on the floor with your knees hip-width apart and your feet pointing straight back behind you.
Place a folded blanket or cushion between your feet and sit back onto it.
Slowly lower your buttocks down onto the floor, keeping your knees together and your feet pointing straight back.
Place your hands on your thighs or on the floor beside your hips.
Lengthen your spine and lift your chest, keeping your shoulders relaxed.
Breathe deeply and hold the pose for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
To release the pose, slowly lift your buttocks off the floor and come back onto your knees.
Stretches the thighs, knees, and ankles
Improves digestion and relieves gas and bloating
Helps to reduce swelling in the legs and feet
Strengthens the arches of the feet
Improves posture and alignment of the spine
Calms the mind and reduces stress and anxiety
